question_text:
Question 65
Pumps 
𝐴
 and 
𝐵
 are being considered for purchase in a chemical plant. Cost details for these two pumps 
are given in the table below. The interest rate is 10 % per annum, compounded annually. For both the 
pumps to have the same capitalized cost, the salvage value (in Rs.) of pump B should be ______ (rounded 
off to the nearest integer). 
 
 [Plant Design and Economic, 2 marks]
Item 
Pump
 A
 
Pump
 B
Installed cost (Rs.) 
16000 
32000
Uniform end of year maintenance (Rs.) 
2400 
1600
Salvage value (Rs.) 
1000 
?
Service life (year(s)) 
1 
2
